description: This dashboard provides performance metrics for Apache and some basic information for operating system.

targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'free' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'used' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE type_instance='buffered' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'cached' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'used' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'free' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'buffered' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'cached' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'slab_recl' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'slab_unrecl' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "interface_rx" WHERE "type"='if_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "interface_tx" WHERE "type"='if_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "disk_read" WHERE "type" = 'disk_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "disk_write" WHERE "type" = 'disk_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM cpu WITH KEY=host

title: Host Overview
